title: Gloria Victis
dimensions:
overall: 140 x 84.1 x 67.3 cm (55 1/8 x 33 1/8 x 26 1/2 in.)

overall (length of sword handle): 8.3 cm (3 1/4 in.)
overall (length of sword hilt): 9.5 cm (3 3/4 in.)
overall (widest point of sword hilt): 5.7 cm (2 1/4 in.)
